Text:
may i ask, how the instructor's name is pronounced ?
(the pdf is a nice summary of perl. but not quite an intro. randall shwartz's articles and books are one of the best IMO and the perl cookbook).

Instructor: Dr. Nicholas C. Maliszewskyj .. not idea how his name is pronounced .. 
Here is Nicholas info

http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=%20nicholas%20c.%20maliszewskyj&source=web&cd=2&ved=0CEkQFjAB&url=http%3A%2F%2Fneutrons.ornl.gov%2Fconf%2Fnobugs2010%2FTuesday%2520Afternoon%2FNOBUGS37_Maliszewskyj.pdf&ei=LdspUNC-F4zQqwGd_oHwBQ&usg=AFQjCNH4taTNsOH6WMZKyUHtIQVQQoPTEA&cad=rja

Just curious, that is all. :)
If you have similar material on perl 6, that would be useful.
